    public class EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder
extends com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.builder.NodeViewElementBuilder
    Experimental. Builds a form control for an embedded Collection of objects. Every item renders as a sub-form with add/remove option.
    Since:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

      • maximumNrOfItems

        public EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder maximumNrOfItems(int maximumNrOfItems)
        Maximum number of items that can be managed through the control. The add option should be disabled if the maximum is reached.
        Returns:
        this.

      • minimumNrOfItems

        public EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder minimumNrOfItems(int minimumNrOfItems)
        Minimum number of items that must be managed through the control. The delete option will be disabled if the minimum is reached.
        Returns:
        this.

      • enableAddingItem

        public EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder enableAddingItem(boolean enableAddingItem)
        Set to true (default) if an add item button should be inserted.

      • enableRemovingItem

        public EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder enableRemovingItem(boolean enableRemovingItem)

        Returns:
        this.

      • sortable

        public EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder sortable(boolean sortable)
        Set to true if a sorting handle should be inserted. Defaults to false.
        Returns:
        this.

      • readonly

        public EmbeddedCollectionViewElementBuilder readonly(boolean readonly)
        Set to true if only the existing values should be rendered, without any possibility of adding/removing/sorting items. This will not render any script templates either.
        Returns:
        this.
